description: Values of n for which iteration of Chowla's function loops.
comments: Chowla's function (A048050) = sum of divisors of n except 1 and n.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (Haskell)a057533 n = a057533_list !! (n-1)a057533_list = filter (\z -> p z [z]) [1..] where   p x ts = y > 0 && (y `elem` ts || p y (y:ts)) where y = a048050 x-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 09 2013
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu) Sep 03 2000
